summary: In the 1970s, Om, an aspiring actor, is murdered, but is immediately reincarnated into the present day. He attempts to discover the mystery of his demise and find Shanti, the love of his previous life.
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Arjun Rampal|Kirron Kher|Shreyas Talpade|Deepika Padukone|Bindu|Javed Sheikh|Satish Shah|Yuvika Chaudhary|Shawar Ali|Asawari Joshi|Nassar Abdulla|Lin Laishram|Masood Akhtar|Sev Anand|Amrita Arora|Malaika Arora|Shabana Azmi|Abhishek Bachchan|Amitabh Bachchan|Navrotem Bain|Vidya Balan|Bipasha Basu|Mithun Chakraborty|Joyeeta Chatterjee|Suresh Chatwal|Juhi Chawla|Sanjiv Chawla|Priyanka Chopra|Yash Chopra|Sabu Cyril|Vishal Dadlani|Bobby Deol|Riteish Deshmukh|Dhananjay|Dharmendra|Kanika Dhillon|Dominic|Doris|Sanjay Dutt|Sunil Dutt|Lara Dutta|Subhash Ghai|Govinda|Haresh Hingorani|Jeetendra|Karan Johar|Kajol|Nakul Kamte|Bikramjeet Kanwarpal|Karisma Kapoor|Rishi Kapoor|Sanjay Kapoor|Tusshar Kapoor|Arbaaz Khan|Farah Khan|Feroz Khan|Saif Ali Khan|Salman Khan|Zayed Khan|Suhaas Khandke|Mahesh Khanna|Rajesh Khanna|Akshay Kumar|Nagesh Kumar|Vivek Kushlani|Bappi Lahiri|Linthiongambi Laishram|Manikandan|Urmila Matondkar|Dia Mirza|Vaibhav Misra|Koena Mitra|Mohan|Dino Morea|Rani Mukerji|Sanjeev Mulchandani|Manish Mundra|Chunky Pandey|Nitish Pandey|Ameesha Patel|Mayur Puri|Raman|Rekha|Hrithik Roshan|Rakesh Roshan|Vikram Sahu|Salim|Samapika|Sharad|Mushtaq Sheikh|Shilpa Shetty Kundra|Sunil Shetty|Aftab Shivdasani|Simon|Sitaram|Srikant|Tabu|Vivek Thakur|Vishwajeet|Yaseen|Preity Zinta|Abdul Quadir Amin|Kareena Kapoor
title: Om Shanti Om
